-- Create Author table CREATE TABLE Author ( author_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, nationality VARCHAR(50), birth_date DATE, biography TEXT );
-- Create Book table CREATE TABLE Book ( book_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, author_id INT NOT NULL, genre VARCHAR(50), publication_date DATE, isbn VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES Author(author_id) );
